title: Fix OTEL collector: issue_id attribution, cost calculation, model name
description: The token-usage.jsonl collector is writing records but issue_id is always empty, total_cost_usd is always 0, model is empty, and duration_ms/num_turns are 0. Fix the collector to: (1) resolve issue_id from the active session context, (2) calculate cost based on model pricing, (3) capture model name, (4) track duration and turn counts. Without issue_id, tokens cannot be joined to issues for efficiency metrics.
close_reason: Fixed all 5 broken fields in beads-collect-tokens.sh: (1) model: now extracted from .message.model in assistant entries; (2) cost: calculated from token counts x model pricing table; (3) duration_ms: computed from first/last transcript timestamps; (4) num_turns: counted from user-type entries; (5) issue_id: added .current-issue fallback. Also fixed duplicate records by deduplicating on session_id before writing. Backfilled 43 existing records to 3 deduplicated records with correct data. All 347 tests pass.
